commitments.heading: Affordability
commitments.desc: We provide the most affordable price on the market. Our goal is to make the PLAB 2 exam prep affordable for every one.

commitments.heading: Small Class Size
commitments.desc: A crowded class is not the best enviroment for learning. This is why all our cohorts have a maximum size of 10 students, that is 1 tutor to 10 student max.

commitments.heading: Convenient
commitments.desc: We understand that our students are busy professionals hence we offer all our services online. You can take our course from the comfort of your home.

commitments.heading: Mocks
commitments.desc: Every student is entitled to 1 mock before their exam. Each mock will be followed by a detailed explanation of performance in each station.

commitments.heading: Dedicated Tutor
commitments.desc: We don't switch tutors, every cohort of students use the same tutor throughout their program, this provides consistency and easy follow up.
